value: <l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">It is as if he was trying to do two things at the same time.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">It is [irrelevant?]: a poem; a break; a mixture of two different [illeg.]</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">He was making it possible for the commoners & the</l>

            <l><del>b</del> nobles to come together in one house; <del>to</del></l>
            <l>listen <del>to the same play.</del> <del>to listen to a play</del></l>
